item.title: Gold prices are smashing record highs but it’s still a risky bet — ‘You’re not sending gold to buy your Domino’s pizza,’ finance expert warns
item.description: Americans are increasingly pessimistic about the economy and expect inflation to rise, the Michigan consumer sentiment survey revealed.

item.title: U.S. crypto czar’s $200 million portfolio held Bitcoin, Coinbase, and Robinhood
item.description: The AI and crypto czar divested a substantial portfolio of crypto holdings before he entered the White House, according to a memo.

item.title: Dr. Oz says probiotic supplements have wide-ranging health benefits. Here’s what science says
item.description: To aid in gut health, Oz has pushed the benefits of probiotics. Do they really work?

item.title: California regulator may allow State Farm to hike home insurance premiums by 22% for a million customers after devastating wildfires
item.description: State Farm said the emergency rate would help the company rebuild its capital following the Los Angeles wildfires.

item.title: Gen Z Americans don’t have enough saved to cover a single month of spending
item.description: Americans born after 1995 were spending double what they had in savings in February, one analysis showed.
